bsxpa02.description: Lets you add an aura effect.

bsfea01.name: Taunt
bsfea01.description: Taunts your target to make it attack you. Chance of success depends on the target's mean skill level.

bsfea02.name: Shielding
bsfea02.description: Protects your target by given a percentage of the damage to you. Efficiency depends on the type of the equipped shield. You must be less than 5 meters away from your target.

bsfma01.name: Taunt power 1
bsfma01.description: Taunts your target to make it attack you. Works 100% on creatures with an average skill of up to $SP_TAUNT.
bsfma01.description2: Taunt Effect - Ideal target skill level: $SP_TAUNT

bsfmb01.name: Shielding power 1
bsfmb01.description: Lasts 15 s, reusable after 120 s. Without shield you take 25% of the damage, with a max of 5 points. With a buckcler you take 50% with a max of 10 points. With a shield you take 75% with a max of 15 points.

bhfppa01.name: Prospecting Plan
bhfppa01.description: Base prospecting stanza. Use it to make raw material sources appear, preferably in combination with other stanzas. For instance, without a 'Find Better Materials' stanza, you will only find Basic raw materials. The sources you find have a 2.5 s extraction time bonus, compared to natural raw material sources.

bhfspa01.name: Spying Plan
bhfspa01.description: Spying base plan stanza for foraging.

bhfppoa01.name: Terrain Specialization
bhfppoa01.description: Reduces the focus consumption of deposit tracking actions; adds a bonus to the extraction rate of the prospected sources.

bhfppob01.name: Material Specialization
bhfppob01.description: Lets you choose the raw material type to prospect.

bhfppoc01.name: Range +
bhfppoc01.description: Extends the range of source prospection.

bhfppod01.name: Cone Angle +
bhfppod01.description: Increases the angle of the cone of source prospection.

bhfppoe01.name: Multiple Spot +
bhfppoe01.description: Finds more than one raw material source.

bhfppoh01.name: Source Time +
bhfppoh01.description: Extends the extraction time of the sources.

bhfppoi01.name: Find Better Materials
bhfppoi01.description: Finds better raw materials (without this stanza you will find only basic raw material).

bhfppok01.name: Deposit tracking
bhfppok01.description: Tracks the nearest raw material deposit in the region, matching the properties set in your action. Use this stanza preferably in combination with other stanzas, to locate deposits containing specific raw materials. For instance, without a 'Find Better Materials' stanza, you will only find Basic raw materials. Please note that a deposit may contain several raw materials, therefore once you have found the deposit, you still need to prospect to find the particular place(s) corresponding to the raw material you are searching for.

bhfppol01.name: Craftable Item Part Specialization
bhfppol01.description: Chooses the raw material you want to find by its usage.

bhfpma01.name: Forest Specialization
bhfpma01.description: Reduces the focus consumption of deposit tracking actions; adds a bonus to the extraction rate of the prospected sources.

bhfpma02.name: Desert Specialization
bhfpma02.description: Reduces the focus consumption of deposit tracking actions; adds a bonus to the extraction rate of the prospected sources.

bhfpma04.name: Lakes Specialization

bhfpma05.name: Prime Roots Specialization
bhfpma05.description: Reduces the focus consumption of deposit tracking actions and adds a bonus to the extraction rate of the prospected sources.

bsxeb01.name: Life Aura
bsxeb01.description: Increases the hit point regeneration speed of yourself and your teammates around you.

bsxeb02.name: Stamina Aura
bsxeb02.description: Increases the stamina regeneration speed of yourself and your teammates around you.

bsxeb03.name: Sap Aura
bsxeb03.description: Increases the sap regeneration speed of yourself and your teammates around you.

bsxma01.name: Life Aura - Power 1
bsxma01.description: Increases the hit point regenration speed of yourself and your teammates within 10 meters of you to $SP_LIFE_AURA for 120 s. Inactive for 1200.
bsxma01.description2: Life Aura - Regen Bonus: $SP_LIFE_AURA. Duration: 120. Latency: 1200.

bsxma02.name: Life Aura - Power 2
bsxma02.description: Increases the hit point regenration speed of yourself and your teammates within 10 meters of you to $SP_LIFE_AURA for 120 s. Inactive for 1200.

bfoa05.name: Circular Attack
bfoa05.description: Allows you to simultaneously hit all enemies engaged in melee combat against you. The damage in shared out between them.

bfmf01.name: Circular Attack 1
bfmf01.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 200% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf02.name: Circular Attack 2
bfmf02.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 240% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf03.name: Circular Attack 3
bfmf03.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 280% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf04.name: Circular Attack 4
bfmf04.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 320% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf05.name: Circular Attack 5
bfmf05.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 360% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf06.name: Circular Attack 6
bfmf06.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 400% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf07.name: Circular Attack 7
bfmf07.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 440% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf08.name: Circular Attack 8
bfmf08.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 470% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bfmf09.name: Circular Attack 9
bfmf09.description: Allows you to inflict damage on all engaged enemies. The total inflicted damage will not exceed 500% of your normal damage. Note that this stanza will not increase the damage for each individual target to above the normal damage.

bmdalea01.name: Fear
bmdalea01.description: Puts fear into the enemy making them incapable of fighting, though they are still able to move.

bmdalea02.name: Sleep
bmdalea02.description: Puts the enemy to sleep making them unable to move or fight. If they are attacked and lose points (hp, sap, stamina or focus) then the enemy will wake up.

bmdalea03.name: Stun
bmdalea03.description: Stuns the enemy making them unable to move or fight.

bmdhtea01.name: Heal
bmdhtea01.description: Restore hit points to your target.

bmoalea01.name: Blind
bmoalea01.description: Blinds your enemy who will become much less efficient in attack.

bmoalea03.name: Madness
bmoalea03.description: Drives the enemy mad, who may then attack themselves.

bmoalea04.name: Slow Attack
bmoalea04.description: Reduces the frequency of enemy attacks.

bmoelea01.name: Acid Drain Damage
bmoelea01.description: The enemy undergoes acid attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea02.name: Cold Drain Damage
bmoelea02.description: The enemy undergoes cold attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea03.name: Rot Drain Damage
bmoelea03.description: The enemy undergoes rot attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea04.name: Electricity Drain Damage
bmoelea04.description: The enemy undergoes electricity attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea05.name: Fire Drain Damage
bmoelea05.description: The enemy undergoes fire attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea06.name: Poison Drain Damage
bmoelea06.description: The enemy undergoes poison attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoelea07.name: Shockwave Drain Damage
bmoelea07.description: The enemy undergoes shockwave attacks over time which repeatedly drain their hit points.

bmoetea01.name: Acid Damage
bmoetea01.description: Inflicts acid damage on your enemy.

bmoetea02.name: Cold Damage
bmoetea02.description: Inflicts cold damage on your enemy.

bmoetea03.name: Rot Damage

bmoetea04.description: Inflicts electricity damage on your enemy.

bmoetea05.description: Inflicts fire damage on your enemy.

bmoetea06.name: Poison Damage
bmoetea06.description: Inflicts poison damage on your enemy.

bmoetea07.name: Shockwave Damage
bmoetea07.description: Inflicts shockwave damage on your enemy.

bmstea01.name: Self Heal
bmstea01.description: Allows you to recover hit points.

bmstea02.name: Self Sap Gift
bmstea02.description: Allows you to recover sap points.

bmstea03.name: Self Stamina Gift
bmstea03.description: Allows you to recover stamina points.

bmstea04.name: Sap Recharge Weapon
bmstea04.description: Recharges the sap on your equipped weapon.

bmpa01.name: Atysian Missile
bmpa01.description: Magic plan stanza used for creating direct damage spells.

bmpa02.name: Atysian Drain
bmpa02.description: Magic plan stanza used for creating damage over time spells.

bmpa03.name: Atysian Affliction
bmpa03.description: Magic plan stanza used for creating offensive spells.

bmpa04.name: Celestial Missile
bmpa04.description: Magic plan stanza used for creating healing spells.

bmpa07.name: Atysian Double Missile
bmpa07.description: Used to create spells with double action of direct damage.

bmpa08.name: Atysian Drain Missile
bmpa08.description: Used to create spells combining direct damage and damage over time.

bmpa09.name: Atysian Afflicting Missile
bmpa09.description: Used to create spells combining direct damage and offensive affliction.

bmpa10.name: Atysian Double Drain
bmpa10.description: Used to create spells inflicting double action of damage over time.

bmpa11.name: Atysian Afflicting Drain
bmpa11.description: Used to create spells combining damage over time and offensive affliction.

bmpa12.name: Celestial Double Missile
bmpa12.description: Used to create double action healing spells.

bmpa13.name: Primal Double Magic
bmpa13.description: Used to create double action self healing spells.

bsfeb08.description: Creates a fire wall around you which wounds enemies that hit you in melee combat.

bsfmi01.description: For 120 seconds a wall of fire is created around you that inflicts 20 damage points on any enemy that attacks you in hand to hand.

bsfeb09.name: Thorn Wall
bsfeb09.description: Creates a thorn wall around you which wounds enemies that hit you in melee combat.

bsfmj01.name: Thorn Wall Power 1
bsfmj01.description: For 70 seconds a wall of thorns is created around you that slows by a factor of $INFO the attack of any enemy in hand to hand.

bsfeb11.description: Creates a lightening wall around you which diminishes the attack skills of enemies that hit you in melee combat.

bsfml01.description: For 120 seconds a wall of electricity is created around you that temporarily reduces the attack skill level by -15 of any enemy in hand to hand.
